K12D0421_H0381:472b-1: shr'i dzny'a na garbha n'a ma yo gi n'i ma h'a tantra r'a dza ya ti r'a dza /
K12D0421_H0381:473a-0: dpal ye shes snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi @473a *//
K12D0421_H0381:473a-2: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0421_H0381:473a-3: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K12D0421_H0381:473a-4: bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mor bye ba
K12D0421_H0381:473a-5: phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kyi mkha' 'gro
K12D0421_H0381:473a-6: dang / mkha' 'gro mas yongs su bskor nas bha
K12D0421_H0381:473a-7: gu la chen po'i skyed mos tshal na bzhugs so
K12D0421_H0381:473a-8: dang / // der bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo
K12D0421_H0381:473a-9: legs dgyes dbang mo dang lhan cig rol pa mdzad
K12D0421_H0381:473a-10: pa'i tshe rje btsun la ba spu langs so //
K12D0421_H0381:473a-11: de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das ma legs dgyes kyi sbyor ba las langs te /
K12D0421_H0381:473a-12: lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K12D0421_H0381:473a-15: ci'i phyir nyid kyi sku la ba spu langs lags /
K12D0421_H0381:473a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:473a-18: de dgos pa ci zhig yod /
K12D0421_H0381:473a-19: gang gi don gyi phyir nga'i sku la ba spu langs pa de ni /
K12D0421_H0381:473a-22: gsang ba chen po lags mod kyang mchog gi dbang phyug bka' stsol cig /
K12D0421_H0381:473a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:473a-24: nga yis legs dgyes kyi bde ba nyams su myong
K12D0421_H0381:473a-25: zhing steng dang 'og gnas pa'i skyed byed ma rnams
K12D0421_H0381:473a-26: la 'dus pa las ba spu langs so //
K12D0421_H0381:473a-27: bcom ldan 'das ma sa gsol pa /
K12D0421_H0381:473b-0: steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga' pa @473b skyed byed ma rnams la 'dus pa ji ltar lags /
K12D0421_H0381:473b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:473b-2: steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga' ba skyed byed
K12D0421_H0381:473b-3: ma rnams la gang zhig 'dus pa de ci'i phyir
K12D0421_H0381:473b-4: mi shes so // bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa /
K12D0421_H0381:473b-6: de skad du de ltar ni lags mod kyi /
K12D0421_H0381:473b-7: 'on kyang mi shes pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bdag gis ni zhus so //
K12D0421_H0381:473b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12D0421_H0381:473b-10: so so rang gi nyams su myong ba yin mod kyang /
K12D0421_H0381:473b-11: 'on kyang khyod kyi ngor ngas bshad par bya ste /
K12D0421_H0381:473b-12: dga' bral gyi dga' ba 'byung ba'i stong phrag bdun
K12D0421_H0381:473b-13: cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi rtsa yi dra
K12D0421_H0381:473b-14: ba 'dar zhing g-yos pa tsam gyis tshul shar ro
K12D0421_H0381:473b-15: // tshul shar bas thig le'i rgyal po zhu'o //
K12D0421_H0381:473b-16: thig le'i rgyal po zhu pa las steng dang 'og
K12D0421_H0381:473b-17: na gnas pa'i dga' ba skyed byed ma rnams la
K12D0421_H0381:473b-18: 'dus pa'o // de skad ces thos nas bcom ldan
K12D0421_H0381:473b-19: 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te dam
K12D0421_H0381:473b-20: du 'khyud pa byas nas ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i btung
K12D0421_H0381:473b-21: bas dgyes par byas te phyin nas yang zhu ba
K12D0421_H0381:473b-22: 'dus pa'o // mdzad do // kye bcom ldan 'das /
K12D0421_H0381:473b-23: dga' bral gyi dga' pa'i dus su 'dus pa lags na /
K12D0421_H0381:473b-24: de la sbyor ba med pa gang gi dus lags /
K12D0421_H0381:473b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:473b-26: dris pa yang dag dgyes pa mchog /
K12D0421_H0381:473b-27: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnyed dka' ba //
K12D0421_H0381:473b-28: dga' bral dus su sbyor ba med //
K12D0421_H0381:474a-0: @474a *// de ni dga' bral dga' ba min //
K12D0421_H0381:474a-3: dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-4: dga' bral la khyad par ci lags /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-7: khyod ci'i phyir de skad ces smra /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-8: dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-9: dga' bral gnyis la khyad par cher yod pa de brjod par bya'o //
K12D0421_H0381:474a-10: gang zhig dga' bral gyi dga' ba de zhu ba gnas pa ste /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-11: 'pho ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
K12D0421_H0381:474a-12: gang zhig dga' bral de ni /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-13: dga' ba dang bral ba 'pho zhing 'jig pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:474a-14: dga' bral gyi dga' ba ni /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-16: 'pho ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir rang gis nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo'o //
K12D0421_H0381:474a-17: bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa; rang gi nyams su
K12D0421_H0381:474a-18: myong ba'i mtshan nyid dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang
K12D0421_H0381:474a-19: / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i khyad par ci lags /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-21: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-23: dngos po ma yin pa yang ma yin /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-26: ye shes las byung ba yang ma yin /
K12D0421_H0381:474a-28: mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin /
K12D0421_H0381:474b-23: rnam pa thams cad dang rnam par bral ba /
K12D0421_H0381:474b-30: de lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gang las rnyed /
K12D0421_H0381:474b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; dga' bral gyi dga' ba nyams su myong ba las rnyed de /
K12D0421_H0381:474b-32: de bzhin du bsam gtan la sogs pas ma yin no //
K12D0421_H0381:474b-34: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba de; dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i nyams su myong ba'i rgyu lags sam /
K12D0421_H0381:474b-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:474b-37: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rgyu yin te /
K12D0421_H0381:474b-40: lhun gyis grub pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba
K12D0421_H0381:474b-41: 'byung ba la rgyu'i dngos pos dgos pa ci mchis
K12D0421_H0381:475a-1: phyir ro; ;ji ltar sreg pa la dud pa bzhin no //
K12D0421_H0381:475a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-3: de skad du smra ba ni /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-5: dang por sreg pa med par der dud pa 'byung ba gang las 'ong /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-6: de lta bu'i rigs las lhan cig skyes pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:475a-8: de ltar lags na lhan cig skyes pa las dga' bral gyi dga' ba ni /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-9: rgyu yang yin la 'bras bu yang yin na /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-12: 'bras bu yang gnyis su dbye ste /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-18: gsal ba'i rgyu ci 'dra ba dang /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-19: 'byung ba'i rgyu ci 'dra ba bstan du gsol /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-22: dga' bral gyi dga' ba ste /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-23: ji ltar mar me bzhin no //
K12D0421_H0381:475a-25: dga' pa las mchog gi dga' ba ste /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-26: ji ltar sa bon las myu gu bzhin no //
K12D0421_H0381:475a-27: dga' bral gyi dga' ba ni /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-28: gzhan rnams dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir 'byung ba'i rgyu ma yin te /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-29: dga' ba gzhan dang mi 'dra ba las 'byung ba yin no; ;dpal ye shes snying po las /
K12D0421_H0381:475a-30: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12D0421_H0381:475b-0: gang zhig @475b dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le'i
K12D0421_H0381:475b-1: rgyud kyi rgyal po las phyag rgya chen po'i don
K12D0421_H0381:475b-2: bstan pa de thob par bya ba'i don du de'i
K12D0421_H0381:475b-3: thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du
K12D0421_H0381:475b-4: gsol bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:475b-5: khyod kyis bdag la zhus pa gang //
K12D0421_H0381:475b-6: nyon cig lha mo rab tu bshad //
K12D0421_H0381:475b-10: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
K12D0421_H0381:475b-11: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12D0421_H0381:475b-13: gang zhig las kyi phyag rgya ni /
K12D0421_H0381:475b-14: snang ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i lo dang ldan pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:475b-15: gang zhig dam tshig gi phyag rgya de ni /
K12D0421_H0381:475b-16: snang ba mched pa'i rang bzhin skye mched kyi lo dang ldan pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:475b-17: gang zhig ye shes kyi phyag rgya de ni /
K12D0421_H0381:475b-18: snang ba thob pa'i rang bzhin khams kyi lo dang ldan pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:475b-19: gang zhig chos kyi phyag rgya de ni /
K12D0421_H0381:475b-21: phyag rgya chen po de yang 'od gsal ma yin pa gzhan las mi rnyed do //
K12D0421_H0381:475b-24: 'od gsal zhes bgyi pa ji ltar lags /
K12D0421_H0381:475b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:475b-28: nam mkha'i dbus su gnas pa'i thig le'i ngo bo ste; des ni /
K12D0421_H0381:475b-29: phyag rgya chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0421_H0381:476a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa @476a *//
K12D0421_H0381:476a-1: las dang dam tshig dang ye shes dang chos kyi phyag rgyas so //
K12D0421_H0381:476a-4: gang las rnyed par 'gyur lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:476a-5: dbang bskur ba'i phyi'i phyag rgya la brten nas nang gi phyag rgya rnams rnyed do //
K12D0421_H0381:476a-7: phyi dang nang gi phyag rgya de gnas gang du gnas par 'gyur /
K12D0421_H0381:476a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:476a-19: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:476a-21: dga' ba'i lo dang ldan pa gzhon nu ma la
K12D0421_H0381:476a-22: rdo rje dang dril bu mnyam par ldan pas nu
K12D0421_H0381:476a-23: ma dang 'dza' gu ni reg par byas pas so
K12D0421_H0381:476a-25: skye mched kyi lo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma
K12D0421_H0381:476a-26: la nang gi rkan yongs su 'jibs pa las so
K12D0421_H0381:476a-28: khams kyi lo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma la
K12D0421_H0381:476a-29: lhan cig srub dang srub pa'i thabs chen po las
K12D0421_H0381:476a-30: zhu ba 'pho ba'i dus su ye shes nyams su
K12D0421_H0381:476a-31: myong bas so // de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa ni /
K12D0421_H0381:476a-32: shes rab ye shes de nyid brtan par byed pa ste /
K12D0421_H0381:476a-33: de'i phyir de ltar de bzhin zhes bstan pa yin no //
K12D0421_H0381:476b-0: brtan par byas pa tsam gyis @476b drug cu rtsa
K12D0421_H0381:476b-1: bzhi 'dab ma'i nang du phyag rgya bzhi mnyam par
K12D0421_H0381:476b-9: rang bzhin gyi rtog pa med pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:476b-12: rten pa'i ngo bos sgrog ma'i rtsa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:476b-13: don dam par phyag rgya chen po gcig pu ste /
K12D0421_H0381:476b-14: 'on kyang las kyi rang bzhin gyis bzhir dbye'o //
K12D0421_H0381:476b-17: de rnams la las kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag ji ltar lags /
K12D0421_H0381:476b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:476b-23: las kyi bye brag gis phyag rgya chen po thob pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:476b-29: drag po rnams kyi ming dang /
K12D0421_H0381:476b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:476b-39: gnyis kyi gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:476b-40: de rnams la spyod pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i spyod pa dang /
K12D0421_H0381:476b-41: brtul zhugs chen po'i spyod pa dang /
K12D0421_H0381:476b-42: gos bral gyi brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang /
K12D0421_H0381:476b-43: rang dbang gi spyod pas so //
K12D0421_H0381:476b-44: dpal ye shes snying po las /
K12D0421_H0381:476b-46: dbang bskur ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0421_H0381:477a-1: dbang bskur ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor rnams ji lta bu /
K12D0421_H0381:477a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:477a-5: slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i dus su rdul tshon la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12D0421_H0381:477a-6: gsang ba'i dbang la bla ma la dbul ba'i dkyil 'khor ni /
K12D0421_H0381:477a-7: rang byung gi me tog dang ldan pa'i me tog gis so //
K12D0421_H0381:477a-8: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su byang
K12D0421_H0381:477a-9: chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i bzhi mnyam gyis so
K12D0421_H0381:477a-10: // bzhi pa'i dus su gzhan ma yin pa byang chub kyi sems 'ba' zhig dkyil 'khor gyis so //
K12D0421_H0381:477a-12: mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477a-13: rgyud thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477a-14: dbang bskur ba la mkhas pa dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477a-15: thugs rje dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477a-16: rgya che ba la mos pa dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477a-18: rab tu sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477a-19: dngos grub thob pa'i slob dpon la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477a-20: dngos grub thob pa'i bla ma'i bka'i gnang ba thob pa dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477a-21: yang na rang nyid dngos grub thob pa des ni /
K12D0421_H0381:477a-23: dbang bskur ba'i rim pa dang; sgrub thabs la sogs pa bya'o //
K12D0421_H0381:477a-24: de bzhin du rtog ge pa la sogs pas ni /
K12D0421_H0381:477b-0: kye bcom ldan 'das slob dpon gyi ni dbang @477b bskur pa'i //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-1: dkyil 'khor mtshan ma ji ltar lags //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-2: dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshad ji tsam //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-3: gtso bo bdag po yang ni gang //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-4: ngo bo gang gis slob ma gzung //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-5: las kyi slob dpon ji lta bu; ;mchod pa rnams ni ji ltar lags //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-6: bla ma'i yon ni ji ltar lags //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-8: khyod kyis bdag la gang zhus pa //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-9: lha mo nyon cig bdag gis bshad; ;mtshan ma'i slob ma'i mos pas so //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-10: yang na ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-12: de bzhin mthe bo'i sor gsum lhag pa'i khru phyed dang do'i dkyil 'khor bya'o //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-14: re zhig mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor yin te /
K12D0421_H0381:477b-15: de'ang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi go rim gyis bya'o //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-16: de yang yan lag thams cad tshang ba'o //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-17: de yi dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri'o //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-18: de'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje ste /
K12D0421_H0381:477b-19: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang du h'um gam rnam pa /
K12D0421_H0381:477b-20: phyi rol tu sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa /
K12D0421_H0381:477b-21: rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan par bya'o //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-22: de'i shar gyi 'dab ma la 'khor lo mdog dkar po dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477b-23: lhor rin po che mdog ser po dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477b-24: nub tu padma mdog dmar po dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477b-25: byang du ral gri mdog ljang gu dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477b-26: me'i mtshams su rin po che'i shing dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477b-28: rlung gi mtshams su rgyal mtshan dang /
K12D0421_H0381:477b-29: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ka p'a la'o //
K12D0421_H0381:477b-30: shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-2: nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-3: byang du rdo rje dril bu'o //
K12D0421_H0381:478a-4: mtshams rnams su me tog gi chun 'phyang dang /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-5: bdug spos kyi reng bu dang /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-7: dri'i dung chos so; ;de'i phyi rol tu rdo rje phreng ba'o //
K12D0421_H0381:478a-8: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang du h'um gi
K12D0421_H0381:478a-9: rnam pa yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje 'dzin
K12D0421_H0381:478a-10: pa chen po zhal gsum pa /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-12: phyag bzhi pa; rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis gnas pa /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-14: nam mkha' sngon po'i mdog can /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-15: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-16: brgyad gnyis kyi lo dang ldan pa; nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang ldan pa /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-17: ral pa'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-22: kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i bdag po'o //
K12D0421_H0381:478a-23: mtshan ma'i skabs su dbus su rdo rje dang /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-25: de nas slob ma sta gon byas la sman sna tshogs kyis khrus byas pa /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-26: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bos slob ma gzung bar bya'o //
K12D0421_H0381:478a-28: bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas a /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-30: mtshan ma cung zad thob pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:478a-31: der mchod pa po rnams shin tu mkhas pa /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-32: chags pa la sogs pa dang bral ba /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-35: slob dpon la dbang bskur ba'i dus su'am /
K12D0421_H0381:478a-36: rgyud thos pa'i dus su shin tu gces pa'i chung ma dang /
K12D0421_H0381:478b-8: na bza' du ma la sogs pa ci tsam nus pa dbal bar bya'o //
K12D0421_H0381:478b-9: nor la sogs pa yod nas gang zhig mi 'bul na /
K12D0421_H0381:478b-11: bskal pa stong gi bar du dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0421_H0381:478b-12: longs spyod med par gyur pas kyang rang gi lus po dbul bar bya ste /
K12D0421_H0381:478b-14: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid dam /
K12D0421_H0381:478b-15: yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0421_H0381:478b-18: sbyin pa la sogs pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas sam /
K12D0421_H0381:478b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:478b-22: sbyin pa la sogs pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas sam /
K12D0421_H0381:478b-24: 'on kyang bla ma la mchod pas bsod nams chen po'i tshogs skye'o //
K12D0421_H0381:478b-25: bsod nams chen po'i tshogs bsags pa las sdig pa'i phung po zad de /
K12D0421_H0381:478b-26: bla ma'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin
K12D0421_H0381:478b-27: rang gi lha'i sku yang dag pa dang phrad pa
K12D0421_H0381:478b-28: thob bo // phrad pas yang dag pa'i man ngag gnang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0421_H0381:478b-29: man ngag thob pa las brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa yin na /
K12D0421_H0381:478b-30: des tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas sam /
K12D0421_H0381:478b-31: rdo rje 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0421_H0381:478b-32: dpal ye shes snying po las /
K12D0421_H0381:479a-0: dkyil 'khor gyi don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum @479a *//
K12D0421_H0381:479a-3: khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-4: mnga' bdag chen po bka' stsol cig /
K12D0421_H0381:479a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-6: bdag gi dkyil 'khor dge ba ni //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-7: nyon cig lha mo rab tu bshad //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-8: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-9: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-10: dra ba dre phyed chun 'phyang dang //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-11: 'dod yon rin chen la sogs brgyan //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-12: de yi dbus su gzhan min bdag /
K12D0421_H0381:479a-13: zhal bzang khyod dang lhan cig go /
K12D0421_H0381:479a-14: phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-15: spyan gsum autpal sngon po'i mdog /
K12D0421_H0381:479a-16: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa dang //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-17: sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-18: zhi ba chen po'i rang bzhin can //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-19: sna tshogs padma'i steng du ni //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-20: 'jigs byed dus mtshan zhabs kyis mnan //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-21: rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis ni bzhugs //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-22: rdo rje dril bu rde'u chung dang //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-23: ka p'a la dang kha tv'am bsnams //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-24: zhal gzhan ser dpad mar dang ljang //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-25: lha mo khyod kyang bdag gi mdog /
K12D0421_H0381:479a-26: zhal gsum ma la spyan gsum pa //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-27: phyag gnyis gri gug pad snod 'dzin //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-28: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-31: 'khor ni gang lags grangs du mchis //
K12D0421_H0381:479a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:479a-33: gang zhig khyod kyis bdag la zhus //
K12D0421_H0381:479b-0: @479b nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad //
K12D0421_H0381:479b-1: dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir dpa' chen po //
K12D0421_H0381:479b-2: shes rab yan lag mas 'khyud cing //
K12D0421_H0381:479b-3: mtshams su rdo rje ma mo bzhi //
K12D0421_H0381:479b-4: sgor ni khros pa'i lha mo bzhi; ;bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa /
K12D0421_H0381:479b-5: de rnams la skyed pa'i cho ga ni /
K12D0421_H0381:479b-7: mdog dang phyag rgya dang bzhugs thabs la sogs ji ltar lags /
K12D0421_H0381:479b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; khyod dang bdag rol pa mdzad cing /
K12D0421_H0381:479b-9: srub pa dang srub pa'i thabs chen po'i sbyor ba'i
K12D0421_H0381:479b-10: dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po tshangs pa
K12D0421_H0381:479b-11: zhes bya ba phyag bzhi pa /
K12D0421_H0381:479b-12: zhal gsum pa; spyan gsum pa /
K12D0421_H0381:479b-13: gser gyi mdog nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis gnas pa /
K12D0421_H0381:479b-14: ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa /
K12D0421_H0381:479b-15: shes rab ma'i yan lag gis 'khyud pa /
K12D0421_H0381:479b-17: rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:479b-24: yang srub pa dang srub pa'i thabs kyis mchog gi
K12D0421_H0381:479b-25: dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po khyab 'jug
K12D0421_H0381:479b-26: ces bya ba ma ra ka ta'i mdog /
K12D0421_H0381:479b-28: tshangs pa bzhin du byang du'o //
K12D0421_H0381:479b-29: yang srub pa dang srub pa'i thabs kyis dga' bral
K12D0421_H0381:479b-30: gyi dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po drag
K12D0421_H0381:479b-31: po zhes bya ba mdog nag po //
K12D0421_H0381:480a-0: yang srub pa dang srub pa'i thabs kyis @480a *//
K12D0421_H0381:480a-1: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo
K12D0421_H0381:480a-2: chen po dbang phyug ces bya ba mdog dkar po
K12D0421_H0381:480a-4: padma'i mtshams su dri zhim pa dang ldan pa'i chus
K12D0421_H0381:480a-5: gang ba'i bum pa'i steng du bdud rtsi lngas bkang
K12D0421_H0381:480a-7: yang srub pa dang srub pa'i thabs kyis ro brgyad
K12D0421_H0381:480a-8: las me'i mtshams su dpa' mo chen mo dkar mo'o
K12D0421_H0381:480a-9: // chu'i mtshams su gzhan gyis mi thub ma bee d'urya'i mdog go /
K12D0421_H0381:480a-10: rlung gi mtshams su dus mtshan ma nam mkha' sngon po'i mdog go /
K12D0421_H0381:480a-11: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su goo r'i mdog ser po'o //
K12D0421_H0381:480a-12: thams cad kyang shin tu lang tsho la bab pa /
K12D0421_H0381:480a-16: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis bzhugs pa /
K12D0421_H0381:480a-23: shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje gtum mo ni /
K12D0421_H0381:480a-24: nag mo chen mo'i mdog go /
K12D0421_H0381:480a-25: byang sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed ma ser mo'i mdog go /
K12D0421_H0381:480a-26: nub sgor rdo rje sgra ma dmar mo chen mo'i mdog go /
K12D0421_H0381:480a-27: lho sgor rdo rje rtsa rtsi ka ljang gu'i mdog go /
K12D0421_H0381:480a-32: na bza' spangs pa rim pa bzhin du nam mkha' lding dang /
K12D0421_H0381:480b-0: @480b ma he'i steng na gnas pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-2: mgo chen po'i chun po 'phyang ba 'dzin pa /
K12D0421_H0381:480b-3: 'jigs byed chen po mche ba gtsigs pa /
K12D0421_H0381:480b-6: sgra chen po'i sgra sgrog pa /
K12D0421_H0381:480b-13: bcom ldan 'das; dpa' bo chen po rnams la shes rab ma'i yan lag ji ltar lags /
K12D0421_H0381:480b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:480b-15: dpa' bo chen po rnams la shes rab ma'i yan lag rang rang gi mdog dang mtshungs pa ste /
K12D0421_H0381:480b-16: 'on kyang khyod bzhin du zhal gcig pa'o //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-17: de lta'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-18: rnal 'byor rgyud du rnyed par dka'//
K12D0421_H0381:480b-19: dgyes pa thams cad grub byed cing //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-20: sdig pa thams cad 'jig par mdzad //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-22: bcom ldan khyod dang bdag skyed pa'i //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-23: sa bon gang lags snying po ci //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-24: nye ba'i snying po ci lta bu //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-25: 'khor gyi sngags ni ji ltar lags //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-27: khyod kyi bdag la gang zhig zhus //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-28: nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-29: sa bon ya sde'i bdun pa ni //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-30: dbyangs yig lnga pa dang ldan pa //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-31: lha mo chen mo thig le ldan //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-32: khyod kyi sa bon rab mchog gi /
K12D0421_H0381:480b-33: ya sde'i sa bon brgyad pa ni //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-34: dbyangs yig drug pa dang ldan pa //
K12D0421_H0381:480b-35: dbu ni thig le yis ni brgyan //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-0: @481a *// bdag gi sa bon rab mchog go /
K12D0421_H0381:481a-1: de ni sa bon gnyis ka rab //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-2: thams cad dbang du byed pa ni //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-3: lus can gsum gyi snying la bzhugs skye ba dang ni sdud byed do //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-4: drug pa brgyad pa bzhi pa dang //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-5: bcu gnyis pa dang bcu dang nyi //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-6: dang por aom dang h'um phat mthar //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-7: bdag gi snying po rab tu mchog /
K12D0421_H0381:481a-8: nyi shu pa dang bcu gnyis mkha'//
K12D0421_H0381:481a-9: dang po dang ni bcu drug nyi //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-10: dbang po tshangs pa h'um phat mthar //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-11: khyod kyi snying po dgyes pa mchog /
K12D0421_H0381:481a-12: dang por aom dang h'um phat mthar //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-13: dbus su ming dang spel ba ni; ;tshogs kun gyi ni sngags yin te //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-14: mchod pa'i dus su mchod par bya //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-15: aom sarba m'a ra bi marda na mah'a bi ra r'a dza h'um h'um phat phat/
K12D0421_H0381:481a-16: skal ldan mo de khyod kyi ni //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-17: nye ba'i snying po drag po che //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-18: aom ham ham ham ham ham/
K12D0421_H0381:481a-19: ke le ke le sarba do sta pra bh'a dza ka h'um h'aum phat phat/
K12D0421_H0381:481a-20: padm'i zhal de dag gi ni //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-22: bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa; sngags 'di la nus pa'i mthu ci tsam zhig mchis lags /
K12D0421_H0381:481a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0421_H0381:481a-24: grub pa tsam gyis khams gsum thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0421_H0381:481a-25: rnal 'byor pa khro ba'i lta bas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na /
K12D0421_H0381:481a-26: lha ma yin gyi dbang po lta bu la 'bum phrag gcig gis gsod par byed do //
K12D0421_H0381:481b-0: zhi ba'i @481b [?] gyis bzlas pa byas nas /
K12D0421_H0381:481b-6: phra mo'i grub pa brgyad skad cig gis byed do //
K12D0421_H0381:481b-7: gzhan yang las du ma rjes su 'brang bar byed do //
K12D0421_H0381:481b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12D0421_H0381:481b-9: bcom ldan 'das ma legs dgyes dbang mo stan las langs nas mgo pos phyag 'tshal te /
K12D0421_H0381:481b-10: 'khor thams cad dang lhan cig tu lan gsum du
K12D0421_H0381:481b-11: bskor ba byas nas rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis
K12D0421_H0381:481b-13: bcom ldan 'das mchog gi dbang phyug legs so legs
K12D0421_H0381:481b-14: so zhes brjod nas yang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor
K12D0421_H0381:481b-15: bas bzhugs so // de'i dus su nam mkha' la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ba'i char dang /
K12D0421_H0381:481b-16: rin po che sna tshogs kyi char chen po bcom
K12D0421_H0381:481b-17: ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'babs par gyur
K12D0421_H0381:481b-18: to // de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog dang
K12D0421_H0381:481b-19: rin po che de dag gis thog tu bcibs te
K12D0421_H0381:481b-20: 'khor dang bcas pa mi snang bar gyur to //
K12D0421_H0381:481b-21: dpal ye shes snying po las /
K12D0421_H0381:481b-22: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0421_H0381:481b-23: dpal ye shes snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor
K12D0421_H0381:481b-24: ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po rdzogs
K12D0421_H0381:482a-0: so //// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal @482a *//
K12D0421_H0381:482a-1: shes rab gsang ba'i zhal snga nas bsgyur ba'o //
